# usa-link



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                                                                                                         | Type      | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `href`    | `href`    | The link href.                                                                                                      | `string`  | `'#'`       |
| `inverse` | `inverse` | Inverse link for dark backgrounds. Previously alt, but changed to avoid confusion with existing HTML alt attribute. | `boolean` | `false`     |
| `text`    | `text`    | The link label.                                                                                                     | `string`  | `undefined` |
